display_long_description:
🎄 The Christmas Haunting has begun!

👻 Play as a Ghost – **Scare Grandpa with Your Voice!**

You Are Ghost is a sandbox adventure where you become a mischievous spirit in a haunted house full of secrets, challenges, and hilarious scares. 

[media]

Embrace your ghostly powers as you roam unseen, solve spooky puzzles, and use your own voice to terrify an old grandpa! 

Will you be a playful trickster or the ultimate nightmare? The house is your playground!

[media]

👻 Become the Ultimate Ghost – Walk through walls, float, and move objects just by thinking about it!

🗣 Scare Grandpa with Your Voice – Whisper, laugh, or scream into your mic and watch him panic!

[media]

🏚 Explore a Haunted Playground – No rules, no limits! Roam freely through a giant haunted house, uncovering hidden rooms, mysterious objects, and eerie surprises.

🎯 Complete Fun Missions & Solve Puzzles – Trick NPCs, uncover paranormal secrets, and test your ghostly skills through spooky challenges!

⚡ Super Interactive Gameplay – Open doors, knock over furniture, flicker lights—cause total chaos and see how NPCs react!

[media]

😂 Prank or Scare? It’s Up to You! – Be a sneaky trickster or a full-on horror legend. You make the rules!

🔥 Mess Around, Have Fun, and Show Off Your Skills!

[media]
